## SUMMARY

1. Roster information = individuals_microdata.dta
 - No info on pregnancy and/or lactating women 
 - No info on who's eating at home (days and/or meals)
 
2. Food consumption = food_items_microdata.dta
 - Info on food consumed provided in Kg/L (not specified)

**Assumption**:
From the Kenya Continuous Household Survey Programme (KCHSP) 2021. Interviewers' Manual (KNBS, 2021). In litre : 401, 405, 406, 402, 404, 403, 407, 409, 411, 507, 905, 907, 1202, 1204, 1205, 1601, 1602, 1603, 1701, 1702, 1703, 1504, 1505.


## Traditional Vegetables 

Traditional vegetables (713) are according to the documentation (REF).

"Fresh Assorted leaves, commonly grown subsistently. Are a variety, namely; pumpkin leaves, pigweed, mchicha, kunde, managu, spider plant (saga, isagek) etc.

UOM: Kilogram"
